title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 520.2 - Withholding of State tax overpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 520.2 - Withholding of State tax overpayments

State Regulations

The department is entitled to receive overpayments of

State tax owed to any individual taxpayer, estate or trust to repay
overpayments of medical assistance received by individuals who are or have been
enrolled as providers in the medical assistance program, provided that the
department (or a social services district) has previously mailed a written
determination or notice to the individual identifying the amount and nature of
the medical assistance overpayments and requesting repayment of the
overpayments in accordance with section
520.3
of this Part. The department
may not receive overpayments of State tax if a proceeding for administrative or
judicial review regarding the overpayments of medical assistance is pending, or
if the time for initiation of such a proceeding has not
expired. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
520.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
